itemDescription: Bishop of Huntingdon; British Anglican bishop

wikipedia_page.main: David Thomson,  (born 2 February 1952) is a British retired Church of England bishop. From 2008 to 2013, he was the Bishop of Huntingdon, sole suffragan bishop of the Diocese of Ely.

link_mentions.page: Bishop of St Edmundsbury and Ipswich
